document_name: Executive Decree No 1 - Creation of the National Committee on Climate Change in Panama
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/PAN/2009/PAN-2009-09-01-Executive Decree No 1 - Creation of the National Committee on Climate Change in Panama_f8f2edc40ecf46e35c6d9dc9838066f4.pdf
document_description: This decree creates the National Climate Change Committee of Panama, in support of the National Environmental Authority (ANAM) in implementation and monitoring of the National Climate Change Policy. The decree determines the missions and organisation of the Committee.
